name: Hugh Manatee
description:
Meet Hugh Manatee, avid shell collector, and wildlife enthusiast. 

Hugh's living conditions have been threatened due to constant pollution of his home. It is your job to keep him safe from the new dangers out there. Dodge, duck, dip, dive, and dodge your way through oncoming obstacles, collect shells, and defeat enemies to gain points. Survive and aim for a high score. Good luck!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • E to taunt
  • SPACEBAR to use tail slap
  • ESC to pause
  • ENTER to confirm
  • Use your mouse to navigate menus
